name: Boom Box (Mr. Minticuz)
description:
I know no one reads this but anyways, this is a basic hyper-casual  platformer game where you have to move a box by creating an explosion to overcome the obstacles and reach the end of the level.

This game is still very much in development (although very close to being finished) so any feedback is appreciated.

!IMPORTANT!

I am currently testing the explosion (or bomb) mechanics so I would really appreciate if you could give me some feedback on how it feels like and also play around in the settings and let me know which way you find it more entertaining and how you find it more fun. Thank you! :)

Also, I am really hoping to make this game available on the mobile platform soon so keep an eye out for that :)
